revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Huawei EchoLife EG8245H]] to [[Huawei EG8245H]]: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=EG8245 |revision=HA (Ver.A) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=09/10/2017 |fcc_id=QISEG8245H |type=fiber gateway, ONT |cpu1_brand=HiSilicon |cpu1_model=SD5113 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABAEA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16FP-DH |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9227 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |flags=GPON, VoIP |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HUAWEI-XXXX |default_ip=192.168.18.1 |default_user=Epuser |default_pass=userEp }} {{TagLine|EchoLife Gateway PON Terminal}} :{{ProductPage|http://e.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-network/access/ont/echolife-eg8245h}} {{SupportPage|http://support.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-network/access/ont/echolife-eg8245h}}
"WAVE->", "HG8245HA Ver.A", and "RGAC7.820.99X-C-LHF/ROH" :are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"The HG8245Q provides two USB ports."
===See also=== *[[Huawei HG861]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg861/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x CATV *[[Huawei HG863]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg863/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 4x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8010]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8010/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8110]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8110/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x POTS (VoIP), 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8240]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8240/index.htm PPage] :EchoLife HG8240 EPON Terminal (PX20+) • [http://blog.ich8.com/post/5862 '''ich8''' blog] <!-- :CPU: [[HiSilicon]] '''SD5113''' RBI (Hass ARM11 @530MHz) :RAM: ''Hynix'' H5PS5162GFR (64MB DDR2); Flash: NAND :PON: ''Hisense'' LTB34D3-CC (EPON-ONU-PX20+) :Switch：[[Atheros]] AR8316-AK1E GbE :Ports: 2x POTS (VoIP), 4x GbE LAN :VoIP：''Legerity'' Le88266DLC :PCB: [http://blog.ich8.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/HUAWEI-HG8240-PIC-1.jpg HG8245GTH]; OUI: 00:25:9E --> *[[Huawei HG8242]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8242/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x CATV *[[Huawei HG8245]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8245/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0; 1T1R Wi-Fi :[[Huawei HG8245H]] • [[Huawei HG8245Q]] • [[Huawei HG8245GTH]] *[[Huawei HG8247]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8247/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x CATV; 1T1R Wi-Fi *[[Huawei HG8447]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8447/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 4x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x CATV; 1T1R Wi-Fi
